hyp: Of course, the name of the festival differs depending on country but the festival duration takes place in the same month, April., This is the festival that I have been last two summers ago and I could tell you all that the experience with this festival is priceless., However, this festival has a clear purpose: reuniting the family and cleaning you for a fresh start in the New Year., In fact, you can find the similar festival in many countries in Asia especially Southeast Asian nations: Cambodia, Laos, Myanmar or even among the Dai people of China., This is what I think the best way how to troll the new year that could make everyone enjoy pulse clame down from the heat of the summer., During the festival period in Thailand, everything and everyone just became ten time more joyful with special energy and kindness., I couldn’t run around the city without seeing people smile, splashing water on others and wishing worlds., I really have to say Songkran is one of the most relaxing and enjoyable festival., Something magical about seeing so many people smile and have tons of fun.
ref: Songkran take place in April. Songkarn purpose are reuniting the family and make you freshly start in the New Year. Songkran festival is in Cambodia, Laos, Myanmar. Songkran festival in Thailand is fascinating. Songkarn is very important for Thai people. Songkarn in Chiangmai is the best. Songkarn could make everyone enjoy pulse clame down from the heat of the summer. Songkran is relaxing and enjoyable festival. Songkarn  is a lot of fun. people are smile, They are splashing water on others and wishing worlds. They use water pistol to celebrate the new year. The experience with this festival is priceless. Songkarn full of fun. I love songkarn so much.
